sentences.english: How much do you owe, Mickie?
When Mickey trips on the stairs of his house, gravity hauls him down.
sentences.chinese: 米奇在他家的楼梯上被绊到的时候，重力会把它拉倒。

sentences.english: I’m going to be an Olympic figure skater.
sentences.chinese: 米奇说，“我要成为奥运会的花样滑冰运动员。”

sentences.english: Dario played the whole 90 minutes to help his country to victory.
sentences.chinese: 西米奇踢满了90分钟并且帮助他的国家取得了胜利。

sentences.english: Mickeys the former leader of the team, and master of the long con.
sentences.chinese: 米奇是团队的前首脑，擅长长线诈骗。

sentences.english: She was swearing for four hours, ” Michnik says.
sentences.chinese: 她赌咒发誓了4个小时，”米奇尼可说。

sentences.english: Mickey and Frank gathered small bills and handfuls of change.
sentences.chinese: 米奇和弗兰克筹集了几块钱和一把硬币。

sentences.english: I'm Wang Zirui. I'm in Mickey Class .
Mickey Mouse is, to me, a symbol of independence.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，米奇老鼠是独立的象征。

sentences.english: They hook up a Maes learning module into Mickey's code.
sentences.chinese: 他们把一个梅斯式的学习模块装载在米奇的编码里。

sentences.english: We like seeing Mickey teaching the snootier characters some gritty life lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢看见米奇教训那些自命不凡的角色。

sentences.english: Pete invites Mickey and his friends to come to his beach blanket luau at StarLake.
sentences.chinese: 皮特请米奇和他的朋友来到他的沙滩毛毯卢奥星湖。

sentences.english: She wouldn’t let me wear a short skating dress either.
sentences.chinese: 米奇说，“她也不让我穿短小的滑冰服。

sentences.english: Revenge becomes the motive to Mikey when his brother Mathis goes missing and is killed.
sentences.chinese: 复仇是米奇的动机时，他的弟弟马西斯失踪和死亡。

sentences.english: But above all, the Mickey push is about selling games.
sentences.chinese: 不过首要的是，推销米奇要与销售游戏相关。

definition: Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
